person.persName: John Watts (New Mexico secretary and commissioner of deeds)

body.p: New Mexico secretary and commissioner of deeds. Indiana native. Son of John Sebree Watts and Elizabeth A. Watts. Lived in New Mexico Territory in 1859. Returned to Indiana for a brief period. Served as private secretary to Governor Henry Connelly of the New Mexico Territory in 1864. Commissioner of deeds for the Commonwealth of Kentucky in New Mexico in 1865.
